title: The Hawaiian story of the wind keepers - Sydney Iaukea

multiple-choice.question: Who was the wind goddess in Hawaiian mythology?
What was the sacred object that Paka'a inherited from his grandmother La'amaomao?

options.label: B
options.text: A gourd that housed the winds of the Islands

multiple-choice.question: Who plotted to drown Paka'a as he sailed away?
What did Kuapaka'a do to the king's fleet while they were sailing off Moloka'i?
What was the wager that Kuapaka'a proposed to the eight fishermen?

options.label: A
options.text: His catch of flying fish against theirs
